mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_NO AS reviewNo , USER_NO AS userNo , TITLE AS title , CONTENT AS content , CREATE_DATE AS createDate , COUNT FROM CP_REVIEW r JOIN CP_USER u ON u.USER_NO = r.USER_NO JOIN CP_POINT p ON p.USER_NO = r.USER_NO WHERE IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC , POINT DESC , USER_LEVEL DESC

SELECT REVIEW_NO AS reviewNo , USER_NO AS userNo , TITLE AS title , CONTENT AS content , CREATE_DATE AS createDate , COUNT , POINT , USER_LEVEL FROM CP_REVIEW r JOIN CP_USER u ON u.USER_NO = r.USER_NO JOIN CP_POINT p ON p.USER_NO = r.USER_NO WHERE IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' AND REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE CP_REVIEW SET IS_ACTIVE = 'N' WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
